comment: Had this professor for venture funding, and I can confidently say he is one of the best professors at KSU. He is so funny and entertaining. We had pop quizzes that were very easy, projects that he helped you with in class, and a fun final project. This is his last time teaching venture funding but I would recommend him for any course!

Professor Hiatt was always inviting, funny and a joy to learn from. This is one of the only classes I will miss. Always extended grace concerning assignments and offered an opportunity to resubmit. Would 100% recommend!

Very manageable workload with minor group reports. Some easy pop quizzes if you pay attention. Dr. Hiatt is genuinely interested in seeing his students succeed and gives plenty of extra credit. Take him!

Dr. Hiatt is a phenomenal professor. His lectures were well-crafted, extremely informative, and conducive to actual learning of the material. He responded to all communications in a timely manner and addressed all course concerns promptly. Best professor I've ever had the pleasure of learning from.

My favorite professor at KSU, I took him any other chance I had. Dr. Hiatt is very respectful and really wants you to learn the material and not just memorize. He offers extra credit for participating and made the class interesting. It was a summer course so it was 3 hours but I never got bored.
Fantastic Professor. Puts significant effort into the class. Lectures are informative and worthwhile.

He is a good teacher, gets the class involved to help you understand. I would advise to show up to class and at least look over the powerpoint before class. I took a hybrid course so it was manageable with all of my other classes.

Take him over any management professor! I took a hybrid class with him, having our weekly class meeting in marietta. I know its a pain to drive there one time a week but it is 100% worth it. Tests are super easy if you follow the powerpoints, group projects are easy as well. 10/10 professor
Took him hybrid. Good class. Group papers with a team. Pop quizzes were graded harshly. Tests are all online and extremely easy. I would recommend him!

Dr. Hiatt is great. He encourages students to be active in class and if you are, you get extra credit. There is a pretty long group project you have to do throughout the semester, but it wasn't too hard and he grades leniently. Attendance isn't mandatory but he does in-class quizzes (and his classes are fun sometimes) so I would recommend going
Dr. Hiatt is a fantastic professor. He is really passionate about what he does and his classes are really fun. I would recommend him 1000%.
Hiatt was by far the Best professor i have had in my time at Kennesaw. TAKE HIM!!! I definitely learned a lot! Easy Easy A if you show up and just do the work. Tons of extra credit opportunity's

Dr. Hiatt is a great professor. He wants everyone to be included in the lecture and loves to give extra credit for participation in class and to go to lectures outside of class. Has a group project that has 5 projects due through the semester. He does like if you come to class and gives pop quizzes, mostly in group, being in class is not mandatory
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS

comment: He makes class as enjoyable as possible. There is a big group project that is broken into different parts, each part submitted at different dates. The tests can be heavy, but there is lots of extra credit options. If you don't show up to class you might not pass.

Took this class in the summer and was really enjoyable. Dr. Hiatt is a great guy and really likes to engage the class during his lectures. He also gives out extra credit for almost anything. There are 3 tests that we took online and 9 quizzes that were in class. There was also a big group project that lasted the whole class. Overall a great class.

Best professor I've had at KSU yet! He was amazing, almost no hw, great engaging lectures, online tests. He gives real-world advice and to top that he is hilarious. I highly recommend you take him, I wish he taught more than MGT3100.

Dr Hiatt was one of the best professors I've ever had. SOOO many extra credit opportunities, and he responds quickly to emails. The group project wasn't bad at all--very straight forward. There's a quiz at the end of each class, so you have to show up but they're usually done with your group and not difficult. TAKE HIM.

Dr Hiatt is one of my favorite professors on campus! Everyday you come to class he starts it off by getting students to tell jokes for extra credit. The environment was so relaxing/informative with the material he taught. There is a semester long group project which can get tough at times but he is always there to help. Would definitely recommend!

Dr. Hiatt is an amazing professor. He gives so many extra credit opportunities that it counts for over a letter grade. It is hard not to fail. If you have a concern about the group project or class in general, he will be glad to help. He should be your first choice!

His class is enjoyable! He gives great lectures, gives you TONS of extra credit opportunities. Class consist of mainly GROUP PROJECTS, & individual tests. No attendance taken but there was a quiz at the end of every class, so you had to show up anyway. TAKE HIM!!
rating_tags: BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES--EXTRA CREDIT--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: Best professor I've ever had! Funny and makes class interesting. Lots of extra credit. Take him!

Mark Hiatt is as good of a professor as you will get. There is a lot of work to do in the group projects, but do well on that, and you will have no problem getting an A. There are plenty of opportunities to earn easy extra credit to balance your grade with. Just show up, participate, and have some jokes ready.
rating_tags: BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES--EXTRA CREDIT--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: Best professor I have had at KSU. Extremely engaging lectures that keep you interested. Tests are online and can be tricky, but a lot of it can be found on quizlet. Group project separated into sections that wasn't too bad. Gives out up to a grade in extra credit. Overall fantastic teacher!

Dr. Hiatt is an amazing professor. There are pop quizzes. Even though I had an 8am class with him, he always made the classes entertaining and fun. He provides lots of extra credit and is not unreasonable with grading. I would definitely take him again.
Try to come to class to earn tons of extra credit.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Participation matters

comment: Great professor. Make sure you keep up with assignments and do well on test. Group project throughout the semester so make sure you come to class and participate.

Super super nice guy and makes the class really enjoyable. If you want an A, all you need to do is study the powerpoint and skim the book. Tons of quirky opportunities to earn extra credit, like telling jokes and singing in front of class. Take Dr. Hiatt if you can!

If you do not get an A in his class, you are not even trying. Dr. Hiatt gives you so many opportunities to raise your grade. He offers SO MUCH extra credit, its not even funny! He's a very friendly guy, good sense of humor. There are a few papers and a group project but its really not that bad. TAKE HIM! One of the best teachers i've ever had.

Professor Hiatt is my favorite professors that i have had at KSU.  His lectures are very interesting and he makes them relate to real life. Not too much work. There is a group project which is not bad at all. Just a few papers and a powerpoint. Tests are online. A LOT OF EXTRA CREDIT! As long as you go to class and participate this class is awesome
He reads straight from the power point in every class. Its extremely boring. His test are online at home and very easy. He gives pop quizzes worth 50 points each and if you miss them you will fail.

This teacher is awesome I've learned so much from him this semester, and I really recomend any one who wants to run their own business one day to take this class. Professor Hiatt makes sense of what most people think is nonsense and teaches life lessons. Test are online. I would definitely take him again.

Dr. Hiatt is one of my favorite professors. Gives alot of extra credit. Test are online. Overall a nice guy and seems to care about his students. I wish he taught more than MGT 3100. Take him if you get the chance.
Dr. Hiatt is the GOAT. By far my favorite teacher at Kennesaw and especially in Coles. Definitely an easy A.

Dr. Hiatt is awesome and take him if you get the chance!  He is really passionate about his subject and has lots of experience in the field.  Class  is easy if you keep up with the quizzes and team project.

this is a GREAT GREAT GREAT GREAT GUY. I read these reviews before I registered for his class. But this guy is amazing. This class was @ 9:30 a.m. and it was my coffee before work. Always engaging and hilarious. Take if you need an A. Do the work, quizzes, and extra credit and you will pass. Don't really need book if you use his powerpoints.

I LOVE DR HIATT!!!! He's genuinely funny, not the teacher-funny where you have to awkwardly laugh to make sure you don't fail the class. He is extremely intelligent, very down to earth and handsome. TAKE HIM IF YOU HAVE ANY CHANCE TO! You will not regret it! Get ready for extra credit, an hour of laughs and an easy A IF you participate )

Very knowledgeable and interesting. However, Entrepreneurship course included a semester long assignment to a group. If you get stuck with a bunch of slackers, beware. Not only will you get stuck writing a 400 point group project solos, but every single class you'll be stuck taking in-class Pop quizzes with the idiots.
awesome teacher!
He's the best of the best!

This professor is the one of the best o have had. He gives out a bunch of EXTRA CREDIT. There is no reason to not make an A in his class. His lectures are great and sometimes you do not even have to class if you do not want to.

Prof. Hiatt is by for one of the best professors that I have had yet. He is always prepared and makes sure that when explaining stuff that he relates it to real world experience. You will learn a lot about project management that will benefit you in your future career. Go to class, pay attention and do the work and you will get a A.
His clarity and performance is great. Most enjoyable class with videos and also has the best content slides

One of the best professors, maybe ever. Not only does he teach you (you actually learn stuff from him), but he makes class fun and interesting. If you follow his instructions, which aren't that hard, you'll get a good grade.

Teacher is very organized and has a very organized way of teaching the class. He always prepared and knows the subject very well. Go to class, study power points and notes and do the assignments and you will do great. Awesome teacher cant wait to take him for project management!!!

Teacher is very organized and has a very organized way of teaching the class. He always prepared and knows the subject very well. Go to class, study power points and notes and do the assignments and you will do great. Awesome teacher cant wait to take him for project management!!!
Very Excellent professor. A lot of industry experience, engaging lectures and enjoyable while highly relevant movie clips. If he's an option for any class, take it!

Dr Mark comes to the classroom with industry experience, making him well-versed in the subject matter. He is by far one of the best professors I have encountered in my academic journey.He is very patient and always open to help student excel.If you follow his instructions as per the syllabus,you'll end up with an easy 'A'.Your hard work is rewarded
Awesome professor, uses real world experience to back up the course material. Does use the textbook but he is extremely helpful

Great professor, really knows his stuff! he has real world business experience and does not bore t you with lectures. keeps class interesting with group projects and movie clips that show business principles.  strongly recommend!

Excellent professor, brings in his real world experience to the classroom. Uses movie clips to demonstrate management principles (from really good movies). Also posts all his powerpoints online, but you don't want to miss his class! His lectures are interactive and interesting, and the three hour class never feels like it. Very relaxed.
